GSD.description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Kasseler CMS 1.1.0 and 1.2.0 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via (1) the nid parameter to index.php in a View action to the News module; (2) the vid parameter to index.php in a Result action to the Voting module; (3) the fid parameter to index.php in a ShowForum action to the Forum module; (4) the tid parameter to index.php in a ShowTopic action to the Forum module; (5) the uname parameter to index.php in a UserInfo action to the Account module; or (6) the module parameter to index.php, probably related to the TopSites module.
